summary: This is an email from Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team to an unspecified recipient (likely the Bureau of Prisons) regarding her conditions while in quarantine at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn. The email requests confirmation of continued access to various privileges and proposes she be quarantined in a day room instead of her isolation cell for health and logistical reasons.

keyFacts: As of November 19, 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell was in quarantine at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn (BOP #02879-509).
Her legal team was actively advocating for her conditions of confinement, specifically regarding access to calls, showers, recreation, legal discovery review, and commissary.

The request specifically sought to move her from an isolation cell to a day room for quarantine to reduce proximity to staff, eliminate repeated searches and exposure to disinfectant spray, and maintain access to legal resources.
The document reflects the operational challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic on legal proceedings and inmate management in late 2020.
The law firm's West 19th Street office was closed at the time, with the team working remotely.
